name: Rapid Robbery
description:
Cops are on the way! Run into the museum, collect as many artifacts as you can, and get back to the getaway car.  Good luck!

Controls

Click on artifacts to steal them

WASD to move, space to jump

Be sure to click on the game screen so that the mouse is contained within the game!

Made for 2020 Vimjam: Collectibles

There was a working menu and UI originally but the export to WebGl and itch.io completely destroyed it, so restarting is pretty bad right now.

This is my first time being in a game jam, and using Unity to make games so the game itself is very clunky.

Also the name on the bottom left is not correct, originally "first person game" was the title but I did not have enough time to change it.

I did use tutorials to help with some of the more advanced coding, such as Brackey's first person tutorial.
